name: Ninja Noby
description:
NINJA NOBY Protect Ninja Noby from the savage robots. How To Play(Phone):

  • Use the on screen arrows to control Ninja Noby
  • Tap an enemy to attack with sword.
  • Collect coins.
  • Swipe Ninja Noby to make him throw knives..
  • Purchase upgrades from the store.
How To Play(PC):

  • Use the arrow keys to control Ninja Noby
  • Tap spacebar to attack with sword.
  • Collect coins.
  • Tap the control key to make Ninja Noby throw knives..
  • Purchase upgrades from the store.
